languages.text: "Оптикон-22, что вы там такое прячете, что раньше никому не показывали, а теперь боитесь бомбить?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
languages.original_text: "Оптикон-22, что вы там такое прячете, что раньше никому не показывали, а теперь боитесь бомбить?"

traits.locale_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
"Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

languages.text: “不得不说，你勾起了我的好奇心，奥普蒂孔22号。开拓者在那颗行星上藏了某些东西，之前不打算给任何人看，现在又不愿意把它毁掉。那到底是什么东西？”
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

traits.locale_text: “不得不说，你勾起了我的好奇心，奥普蒂孔22号。开拓者在那颗行星上藏了某些东西，之前不打算给任何人看，现在又不愿意把它毁掉。那到底是什么东西？”

languages.text: « Opticon-22, je dois bien admettre que vous avez piqué ma curiosité. Les Explorators cachent quelque chose sur cette planète, quelque chose que vous refusez de montrer à qui que ce soit et rechignez à détruire. De quoi s'agit-il ? »
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

traits.locale_text: « Opticon-22, je dois bien admettre que vous avez piqué ma curiosité. Les Explorators cachent quelque chose sur cette planète, quelque chose que vous refusez de montrer à qui que ce soit et rechignez à détruire. De quoi s'agit-il ? »

languages.text: 「オプティコン-22、これは非常に興味がそそられる。探索家たちはあの惑星に何かを隠している。お前が誰にも見せたがらないもので、今は破壊を願っている。一体なんなんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

traits.locale_text: 「オプティコン-22、これは非常に興味がそそられる。探索家たちはあの惑星に何かを隠している。お前が誰にも見せたがらないもので、今は破壊を願っている。一体なんなんだ？」

languages.text: «Opticon-22, admito que me puede la curiosidad. Los Exploradores tienen algo escondido en ese planeta, algo que se negaban a revelar y que ahora se niegan a destruir. ¿De qué se trata?».
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

traits.locale_text: «Opticon-22, admito que me puede la curiosidad. Los Exploradores tienen algo escondido en ese planeta, algo que se negaban a revelar y que ahora se niegan a destruir. ¿De qué se trata?».

languages.text: "Opticon-22, ich muss sagen, meine Neugier ist geweckt. Die Exploratoren verstecken auf diesem Planeten irgendetwas. Etwas, was Ihr niemandem zeigen wolltet und nun nicht zerstören wollt. Was ist es?"
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"

traits.locale_text: "Opticon-22, ich muss sagen, meine Neugier ist geweckt. Die Exploratoren verstecken auf diesem Planeten irgendetwas. Etwas, was Ihr niemandem zeigen wolltet und nun nicht zerstören wollt. Was ist es?"

languages.text: "Merakımı cezbettiğini itiraf etmeliyim Opticon-22. Keşiftörler, bu gezegende bir şey saklıyor olmalı. Herkesin gözünden sakındığınız ve yok etmeye kıyamadığınız bir şey... Peki o şey ne?"
languages.original_text: "Opticon-22, I must say my curiosity is piqued. The Explorators are hiding something on that planet, something you refused to show to anyone and are now loath to destroy. What is it?"
